text: I noticed the new link in theme settings too and figured out what it was by trial and error, it wasn't mentioned in any update I came across - maybe we both missed it since it was so small and no clear name for it

It's definitely new!
I think it was released when the brandkits got updated a few weeks/months ago.. since it allows you to quickly link/reset the brand-kit updates.
But yes - it isn't documented (at least <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/cms/fields/module-theme-fields#color|here>) and wasn't mentioned in a changelog :disappointed:
